EmailTemplate.name: (whynopo) - reasons for declining PO App
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I understand this news can be disappointing – please let me explain.
After evaluating your application, our accounting department determined that we’re unable to allow [XXX ] to order on credit. Payment by invoicing is reserved for very large rental orders, and is further based on a number of factors, including business size and years in existence. Ultimately, the decision lies with our insurance underwriters. Unfortunately, I can’t offer any more details since I can’t see exactly what went into the underwriters’ decision.
I’d still like to accommodate your rental request, so please let me know if there’s anything else I can do to help!
Kindly,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} BorrowLenses.com Purchase Order Accounts accounts@BorrowLenses.com
